This is just a regular text document without any legal content.
It contains no Polish legal terminology, no case numbers, 
no court references, and no article citations.

This document should fail legal validation tests because
it lacks the required structure and content of Polish legal documents.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

This text is in English and has no Polish diacritical marks.
It should trigger warnings in the validation system.
